title: Myths of childhood. Part 1
creator_credit: Film Australia, Anna Grieve and Sarah Gibson
brief_description: In this provocative three-part series, the idea that children are innocent is confronted, aks why we blame childhood for adult unhappiness and questions the ambitions of parents who strive to be perfect. Children and adults from Australia, the USA and the United Kingdom talk about their own experiences. Best selling authors including Penelope Leach, Thomas Moore, Martin Seligman and Marina Warner discuss changing ideas about childhood and the raising of children.
